A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT /* 잔고 */ , CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT, 0) END) = 0 THEN '이행' ELSE '미이행' END AS PFRM_CLSF_NM /* 이행여부 */ , A.PFRM_DT /* 이행일자 */ , CASE WHEN A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(A.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT - A.MTRT_HLD_AMT, 0) END AS NRPY_RA /* 미해소잔액 */ , A.DPRT_CD /* 부서코드 */ , A.DPRT_NM /* 부서이름 */ , A.EMP_NM /* 담당자이름 */ , (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM RAA91B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I003' AND CD_VL_ID = A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD) AS INSPCT_DPRT_CCD /* 심사부서코드 */ , A.OWN_EMP_NM /* 담당심사역이름 */ , A.RCG_RQS_DT /* 승인요청일 */ , A.RCG_DT /* 승인일 */ , A.CNFR_DT1 /* 심사역확인일 */ , A.CNFR_DT2 /* 심사부서장확인일 */ , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT /* 참여현황 */ , A.BSNS_STTN_AND_PRSPCT_SMRY /* 진행경과 */ , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 /* BaseCase */ , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 /* StressCase */ , A.RPR_RSN_CNTNT /* 기타특이사항 */ , A.OBLG_PFRM_CCD /* 이행구분 */ FROM (SELECT '01' AS OBLG_PFRM_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_NM , A.ITEM_SQ , A.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , A.RSLTN_DT , A.RSLT_CNTNT , A.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , A.INVST_CRNCY_CD , A.RCG_AMT , A.END_DT_END_DT , A.APLC_AMT , A.RCG_AMT - A.APLC_AMT AS MTRT_HLD_AMT , IFNULL(B.CRNCY_BK_AMT, 0) AS OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT , A.PFRM_DT , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , A.DPRT_CD , (SELECT DPRT_NM FROM RAA98A WHERE DPRT_CD = A.DPRT_CD) AS DPRT_NM , A.CHRG_P_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM RAA92B WHERE ENO = A.CHRG_P_ENO) AS EMP_NM , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , A.OWN_P_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM RAA92B WHERE ENO = A.OWN_P_ENO) AS OWN_EMP_NM , A.RCG_RQS_DT , A.RCG_DT , A.CNFR_DT1 , A.CNFR_DT2 , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , A.BSNS_STTN_AND_PRSPCT_SMRY , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , A.RPR_RSN_CNTNT , CASE WHEN IFNULL(B.CRNCY_BK_AMT, 0) - (A.RCG_AMT - A.APLC_AMT) > 0 AND A.END_DT_END_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(SYSDATE() , INTERVAL 14 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND (A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD IS NULL OR A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD != '50') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PFRM_PLAN_YN FROM (SELECT A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.IB_DEAL_SNM_NM AS IB_DEAL_NM , C.ITEM_SQ , NULL AS RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , NULL AS MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , NULL AS BSNS_STTN_AND_PRSPCT_SMRY , NULL AS PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , NULL AS PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , NULL AS RPR_RSN_CNTNT , NULL AS RCG_RQS_DT , NULL AS RCG_DT , NULL AS CNFR_DT1 , NULL AS CNFR_DT2 , A.DPRT_CD , A.CHRG_P_ENO , A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , A.OWN_P_ENO , A.INVST_CRNCY_CD , A.RISK_RCG_NO , B.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , B.RSLTN_DT , B.RCG_AMT , CASE WHEN B.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '2' THEN REPLACE(B.RSLT_CNTNT, CHR(10), ' ') WHEN B.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '3' THEN REPLACE(B.CNFRNC_NTM_CNDTL_CNTNT , CHR(10), ' ') ELSE NULL END AS RSLT_CNTNT , B.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , C.END_DT_END_DT , IFNULL(C.APLC_AMT, 0) AS APLC_AMT , IFNULL(C.MTRT_HLD_AMT, 0) AS MTRT_HLD_AMT , C.PFRM_DT , A.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD FROM RAA02B A LEFT JOIN RAA22B B ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = B.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = B.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = B.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT OUTER JOIN RAA09B C ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = C.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = C.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = C.LST_C_CASE_CCD WHERE A.INSPCT_PRGRS_ST_CD = '500' /* 심사진행상태코드(약정완료) */ AND A.END_DT IS NULL /* EXIT가 아직 안된 안건들 */ AND B.SDN_CNDT_F = 'Y' /* 셀다운조건여부 */ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RAA36B rb WHERE rb.OBLG_PFRM_CCD = '01' AND rb.IB_DEAL_NO = A.IB_DEAL_NO AND rb.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND rb.LST_C_CASE_CCD = A.LST_C_CASE_CCD AND rb.ITEM_SQ = C.ITEM_SQ) /* 작성이력이 없는 대상만 출력 */ UNION ALL SELECT A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , B.IB_DEAL_SNM_NM AS IB_DEAL_NM , A.ITEM_SQ , A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD , A.MAIN_PRGRS_STTN_CNTNT , A.BSNS_STTN_AND_PRSPCT_SMRY , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT1 , A.PRCS_PLAN_CNTNT2 , A.RPR_RSN_CNTNT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM1,'%Y%m%d') AS RCG_RQS_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM2,'%Y%m%d') AS RCG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM3,'%Y%m%d') AS CNFR_DT1 , DATE_FORMAT(A.APRV_DY_TM4,'%Y%m%d') AS CNFR_DT2 , B.DPRT_CD , B.CHRG_P_ENO , B.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , B.OWN_P_ENO , B.INVST_CRNCY_CD , B.RISK_RCG_NO , C.INSPCT_CNFRNC_CCD , C.RSLTN_DT , C.RCG_AMT , CASE WHEN C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '2' THEN REPLACE(C.RSLT_CNTNT, CHR(10), ' ') WHEN C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD = '3' THEN REPLACE(C.CNFRNC_NTM_CNDTL_CNTNT , CHR(10), ' ') ELSE NULL END AS RSLT_CNTNT , C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD , D.END_DT_END_DT , D.APLC_AMT , D.MTRT_HLD_AMT , D.PFRM_DT , B.FNC_GDS_DVD_CD FROM RAA36B A LEFT JOIN RAA02B B ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = B.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = B.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = B.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA22B C ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = C.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = C.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = C.LST_C_CASE_CCD LEFT JOIN RAA09B D ON A.IB_DEAL_NO = D.IB_DEAL_NO AND A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD = D.RISK_INSPCT_CCD AND A.LST_C_CASE_CCD = D.LST_C_CASE_CCD AND A.ITEM_SQ = D.ITEM_SQ ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.RISK_RCG_NO , SUM(A.CRNCY_BK_AMT) AS CRNCY_BK_AMT FROM RAA49B A WHERE STD_DT = (SELECT MAX(STD_DT) FROM RAA49B) GROUP BY RISK_RCG_NO ) B ON A.RISK_RCG_NO = B.RISK_RCG_NO ) A WHERE (IF(#{dprtCd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.DPRT_CD = UPPER(#{dprtCd}) AND (IF(#{chrgPEno} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.CHRG_P_ENO = UPPER(#{chrgPEno}) AND (IF(#{inspctDprtCcd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.INSPCT_DPRT_CCD = UPPER(#{inspctDprtCcd}) AND (IF(#{ownPEno} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.OWN_P_ENO = UPPER(#{ownPEno}) AND (IF(#{rprPrgrsStCd} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR A.RPR_PRGRS_ST_CD = UPPER(#{rprPrgrsStCd}) AND (IF(#{ibDealNm} = '', NULL, FALSE) IS NULL) OR UPPER(A.IB_DEAL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{ibDealNm}),'%') AND #{PFRM_PLAN_YN} = 'N' OR (#{PFRM_PLAN_YN} = 'Y' AND A.PFRM_PLAN_YN = #{PFRM_PLAN_YN})
ORDER BY A.DPRT_CD , A.IB_DEAL_NO , A.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.ITEM_SQ
